        public LocalDateTime nextActionTime(LocalDateTime currentActionTime)
        Description copied from class: Schedule
        Get time of next action. May increment any internal counters which may influence the value returned by Schedule.nextSchedule(LocalDateTime) or Schedule.getAction().
